channel.title: Welcome, my new friend~~ on Lee's Doc Site
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome, my new friend~~ on Lee's Doc Site

item.title: How to Create a Personal Website
item.description: 1 Overview If you want to have your own website, this blog will be your best helper. It will show you how to build and publish your website quickly from scratch. 2 Preparation for Construction 2.1 Documentation Preparation There are two methods for you to choose: Method 1 (Recommended) First, visit https://gohugo.io/ (Hugo official website). Then, click Quick Start on the homepage to get help information for building a website with Hugo.
